thread.title: ECB drops easing bias en route to stimulus exit

title: ECB drops easing bias en route to stimulus exit
text:
ECB drops easing bias en route to stimulus exit 8:39pm IST - 02:57 
The European Central Bank dropped a long-standing pledge on Thursday to increase its bond buying if needed, taking another small step in weaning the euro zone economy off protracted stimulus. (Rough Cut only - no reporters narration)   
The European Central Bank dropped a long-standing pledge on Thursday to increase its bond buying if needed, taking another small step in weaning the euro zone economy off protracted stimulus. (Rough Cut only - no reporters narration)  //reut.rs/2I9fNYC
